data.text: @RoyalReporter A lot of Africans were heavily involved too.
@RoyalReporter Any thoughts on why no apology?

@RoyalReporter Instead of a Dutch fort, Charles should have done his Ghana speech at either Cape Coast or Elmina castles where the Royal Africa Company kept slaves prior to shipping to the Americas. A slave trade apology from the Royal Family should have been made

https://t.co/0JCblCeMRb
